lead_paragraph: When the Anaheim Ducks returned from their longest road trip of the season, they never even broke stride in their skate toward the top of the standings.

headline.print_headline: Kesler Powers Ducks to 5th Straight Win, 5-2 Over Flames
headline.main: Kesler Powers Ducks to 5th Straight Win, 5-2 Over Flames
